page.title: 06Local History-Seaford Fort
page.content:
{ The Ramparts of Seaford Head { Hill Fort }
These are over 2000 years old and were first constructed during The Iron Age.Beneath the{earthen ramparts}is a {ditch}which was much deeper than it is now.The rampart was 6ft higher,for over 2000 years of wind and rain,of people and animals walking over it, and creatures burrowing in it have acted to reduce its height. When it was occupied there would have been no shrubs near the fort as they would have been used as firewood by the tribesmen.
